original: 8.1.2. Suttantacittamissakavisesa🔽Yassa sarāgaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati …pe… yassa vītarāgaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa sadosaṁ
analyzed: suttanta citta missaka visesa  yassa sa rāgam cittam uppajjati pe yassa vīta rāgam cittam uppajjati yassa sa dosa
translated: … The special combination of the suttas on consciousness

original: cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa vītadosaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa samohaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati🔽… yassa vītamohaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa saṅkhittaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa vikkhittaṁ🔽cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa mahaggataṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa amahaggataṁ cittaṁ uppajjati🔽… yassa sauttaraṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa anuttaraṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa samāhitaṁ
analyzed: cittam uppajjati yassa vīta dosam cittam uppajjati yassa sa moham cittam uppajjati  yassa vīta moham cittam uppajjati yassa saṅkhittam cittam uppajjati yassa vikkhitta  cittam uppajjati yassa mahaggatam cittam uppajjati yassa amahaggatam cittam uppajjati  yassa sauttaram cittam uppajjati yassa anuttaram cittam uppajjati yassa samāhita
translated: In the case of someone in whom a consciousness with lust arises … in the case of someone in whom a consciousness without lust arises … in the case of someone in whom a consciousness with aversion arises … in the case of someone in whom a consciousness without aversion arises … in the case of someone in whom a consciousness with delusion arises …🔽in the case of someone in whom a consciousness without delusion arises … in the case of someone in whom a contracted consciousness arises … in the case of someone in whom a distracted consciousness arises … in the case of someone in whom an exalted consciousness arises … in the case of someone in whom a low consciousness arises …

original: cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa asamāhitaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati … yassa vimuttaṁ cittaṁ uppajjati
analyzed: cittam uppajjati yassa asamāhitam cittam uppajjati yassa vimuttam cittam uppajjati
translated: in the case of someone in whom a consciousness with a superior grade arises … in the case of someone in whom a consciousness with an unsurpassed grade arises … in the case of someone in whom a concentrated consciousness arises … in the case of someone in whom an unconcentrated consciousness arises … in the case of someone in whom a liberated consciousness arises …
in the case of someone in whom an unliberated consciousness arises … ?
